article_title: Over 30K creators joined Patreon this month, as COVID-19 outbreak spreads
article_description: Creative professionals whose livelihoods have been impacted by the COVID 19 outbreak are flocking to membership platform Patreon in record numbers  the company claims  During the first three weeks of March  more than 30 000 new creators launched on the site
article_content: Creative professionals whose livelihoods have been impacted by the COVID 19 outbreak are flocking to membership platform Patreon in record numbers  the company claims  During the first three weeks of March  more than 30 000 new creators launched on the site    2739 chars
